dublin_core.dcvalue: There is increasing interest and activity in the provision of teleassessment and telerehabilitation services to individuals with traumatic brain injury Yet little formal research exists and there are no large scale clinical trials or evidence based applications of these technologies in TBI The present commentary will address several areas that warrant critical consideration before telerehabilitation is likely to be widely implemented and reimbursed
Clinical and methodological considerations in the application of telerehabilitation after traumatic brain injury: a commentary.
